channel.title: Animiated Water on Intdubpk? [im in high detail]
channel.description:
ok so im playing in high detail, firecapes move, same as low detail, magic tree's are animiated same as the lowdeatil.
water looks like paint in low & high detail?
how the HELL can i animiate it, to like the look of 474?

item.title: Animiated Water on Intdubpk? [im in high detail]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

This is client sided, in the class that handles Textures.

You can make water move by doing this; as a matter of fact there is a tutorial on this here.

Read full topic
item.source: Animiated Water on Intdubpk? [im in high detail]
